game.name: BACKROOMS: DON'T LOOK AWAY
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, PvP, Online PvP, Co-op, Online Co-op, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: A terrifying multiplayer horror experience set in the Backrooms. Four survivors against player-controlled mannequins that can only move when nobody is watching!
game.shortDescriptionEn: A terrifying multiplayer horror experience set in the Backrooms. Four survivors against player-controlled mannequins that can only move when nobody is watching!
